data.why:
Class::Wrapper is a base class for the Decorator design pattern. It
    features autogenerated dispatch and accessor methods.

    Class::Wrapper makes it possible to dynamically add functionality
    to objects. It is also possible to modify existing functionality.
    The autogenerated accessor methods makes it possible to access
    properties of decorated objects.

    Class::Wrapper decorators may be layered. It is also possible to
    let them use inheritance to pass isa() tests.
